title: Plz help meh
body:
I am really bad at league, and I was wondering if anyone would be willing to give me some tips on what I am doing wrong and maybe help me improve my game a bit. Yes I have watched videos on how to improve and different builds with runes / masteries, but it doesn't seem to help much.

You don't HAVE to help me, just wondering if anyone is interested in helping an unranked.

replies.body:
Watch this play list - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iko2tqmDpJQ&list=PL9RdXhXESRJzgY_SwHB8T-cZxXljWhQvz

Especially trading stance and retaliation trade. If you can master those two + csing then you are well on your way to becoming a good player.

All the videos are a big help but I would suggest mastering one at a time.
thank you for the comment and the video, it really helped me improve my gameplay alot, i seriously can not thank you enough for this.
no worries mate, its a great video series. =D
